title: Extended GeoJSON with structuredPropertiesSchema (GeoJSON-SPS)
description: Schema version 0.01 of GeoJSON-SPS for structuredPropertiesSchema.

metadata.description: General file-level metadata with suggested fields, but allows user-defined properties.

file_type.description: Type of data file (e.g., harvest, planting)

date.description: Date and time in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2024-10-02T10:00:00Z) of event

start_time.description: Start Date and time in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2024-10-02T10:00:00Z) of event

end_time.description: End Date and time in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2024-10-02T10:00:00Z) of event

created_by.description: System or person that generated the file

created_at.description: Date and time in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2024-10-02T10:00:00Z) the file was created

type.description: The value type of the property.

standard_ref.description: Name of the standards registry for the standard_code.

standard_code.description: Code or identifier in the referenced standards registry.

index.description: Index position in the structuredProperties array.

structuredProperties.description: Ordered property values as defined in the structuredPropertiesSchema.
